column5: OFC's own MSP is pictured in Toronto's newest Biodiversity Booklet(Fishes of Toronto) p.24  It is a shot of him with a Pike (not one of his biggest) with the Skydome and CN Tower in the background. Wtg Mike  The booklet also gets a blurb in this months OOD.  The booklets(almost 80pp.) are free from Toronto area Libraries(just ask the librarian).  Cheers
